jd: From: Pavankalyan, Atvsllc pavankalyan.p@atvsllc.com Reply to: pavankalyan.p@atvsllc.com JD;Cloud Development Engineer Location: Westlake, TX Client: MphasisSkills required: Day two support Cloud Development Engineer Skills Targeted (compared to a general developer) 1) Cloud Experience (Azure, AKS prioritized, GCP secondary) 2) Systems Engineering - Experience with Infrastructure-as-Code - Experience with cloud computing infrastructure (virtual networking, containers, runtime orchestration, API-driven web services [e.g. object storage, event management services]) 3) Automation Engineering - Business Process Engineering - Systems Integration and Automation (e.g. multi-protocol, transactional event processing, batch, concurrency) 4) Software Development - Microservices architecture and development experience - Data design and database schema experience with structured and unstructured database systems - DevOps experience 5) Platform Engineering - cloud observability tools - cloud resiliency - critical application support in multi region architectures 6) Systems Design - advertising services for enterprise consumption via API gateway - knowledge of modern web application architectures and how they align with cloud native infrastructure Reference Applications Conversant in Cloud technologies experience with technology based learning plans and content Working with L&D ability to create/maintain Cloud scenario based learning paths for all roles ability to create reference applications and materials to support the learning paths excellent communication skills both written and verbal
